description.text: The Submodel “ControlConfig” is the collection for various parametrizations for the control of CNC machines
Reference to the digital nameplate of the controller.

qualifiers.value: Submodel Element reference to the digital nameplate of the control.

description.text: The Controller Type describes the type of controller

qualifiers.value: Path controlled; Point controlled, Track controlled

description.text: Time unit of the control
Length Unit of the control
Fieldbus Type of the control
Defines the cycle time of the CNC control
Defines the cycle time of the PLC control
Defines the cycle time of the fieldbus control
Defines the velocity unit of the CNC control
Defines the acceleration unit unit of the CNC control
Defines the jerk unit of the CNC control
Control configuration data
Steuerungskonfigurationsdaten

qualifiers.value: Provide the configuration data for the controler.

description.text: Name of the control configuration file
File to configure the control
Collection of channels of the control

qualifiers.value: Provides access to the paramtization of the channels/axes/drives

description.text: Configuration information of a specific channel
This describes the unique channel identification of the specific channel
The SMC “AxesReference” is a collection of referenced axes for the specific channel.

qualifiers.value: Collection of referenced axes for the specific channel

description.text: Unique axis name
Reference to the axis
The SMC “Axes” is a collection of axes of the CNC controller.

qualifiers.value: List of axes of the specific channel

description.text: The SMC “Axis” is a collection of axis configuration information.

qualifiers.value: List of axis specific configuration data

description.text: Name of the axis
Type of the axis
Axis is a simulated or real one

qualifiers.value: Axis is a simulated or real one

description.text: Positive software limit switch
Negative software limit switch
Velocity limit of the axis
Accelerationlimit of the axis
Jerk limit of the axis
The SMC “AxisConfigData” is a collection of axis configuration data.
Axis configuration file name
Configuration file of the axis
The SMC “Drive” is a collection of drive configuration information.
The manual file of the drive
Reference to the Submodel Technical Specification of the axis to gather more information

qualifiers.value: Reference to the technical Data of the drive

description.text: The SMC “DriveConfigData” is a collection of drive configuration data.
Name of the configuration file of the drive

qualifiers.value: Filename of of the configuration file

description.text: Configuration File of the drive
The SMC “NCProgramConfig” is a collection of NC program configuration information.
NC program file type, which the CNC control can work with

qualifiers.value: File type (extension) of the NC program file

description.text: NC program syntax type
Manual file of the syntax of the NC program

qualifiers.value: The description of the synatx of the machine code implementation of the cnc machine

description.text: The SMC “CommunicationConfig” is a collection of communication configuration information.

qualifiers.value: Provides the communication information to access the CNC.

description.text: Type of communication to the control

qualifiers.value: Type of the communication access to the CNC.

description.text: Communication address into the control

qualifiers.value: Information model of the communication configuration

qualifiers.value: Reference to the OPCUA server datasheet Submodel

description.text: Explanation: The SMC “Tools” is a collection of tools of the CNC controller.
The SMC “Tool” is a collection of tool configuration information.
